rules.name: IM_POM_OS_Requested
rules.conditionLogic: 1 OR 2 OR 3 OR (1 AND 2) OR (2 AND 3) OR (1 AND 3) OR (1 AND 2 AND 3)
rules.label: IM/POM/OS Requested

Flow.description: Added the Volume % Adyen, Share of Wallet for POM + Ecommerce to the 'You are completing the Handover' screen message

formulas.name: forValidAssignedAm
formulas.expression: AND( NOT(ISBLANK({!GetHandover.AssignToUser__c})), {!GetHandover.AssignToUser__r.IsActive}=True, OR( {!GetHandover.AssignToUser__r.Profile_Name__c} = "Adyen v2 Account Manager", {!GetHandover.AssignToUser__r.Profile_Name__c} = "Adyen v2 Account Manager Lead", {!GetHandover.AssignToUser__r.Profile_Name__c} = "Adyen v2 Customer Success", {!GetHandover.AssignToUser__r.Profile_Name__c} = "Adyen v2 Customer Success Lead"))

Flow.label: Update Handover Status

fields.name: Business_as_Usual_AMIMPOM
fields.helpText: Please complete this section when your merchant or partner is already live. This is to ensure a smooth handover to AM and Support. See which information is needed on this hub page: https://hub.is.adyen.com/our-company/organization/functions/operations/project-ops-management/pomim-sf-handover-flow/handover-from-impom-to-amsupport/

fields.name: CompletingHandoverAMCSM
fields.fieldText:
If you continue, certain fields displayed on the Handover will be copied over to the Account.

These fields are the following:


  • ATV
  • BackOffice Account
  • Business as Usual
  • Merchant Core Business Model
  • Sub-Business Model
  • Commercial Contact Merchant
  • Ecommerce Platform
  • Ecommerce Integrations
  • Ecommerce System Integrator
  • Entities
  • IPP Platform
  • IPP Integrations
  • IPP System Integrator
  • Preferred Language
  • Share of Wallet % for Ecommerce
  • Share of Wallet % for IPP
  • Technical Contact Merchant
  • Technical Contact System Integrator
  • Volume % Adyen
  • Website

fields.name: disErrorText_0
fields.fieldText:
Something went wrong during this process due to the following error:


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}


Please retry if you understand what goes wrong, otherwise reach out to your System Administrator.

fields.name: StatusChangedSuccessMessage
fields.fieldText: The status of your Handover has successfully changed!
